title: I think you guys forgot something in the audio options
body:
No screencaps sorry

So I go into the audio options to see if riot decided to be good guy greg and include the bilgewater themed music as an option and much to my excitement 2 options appear on the pulldown menu: Updated and Bilgewater. However when I select bilgewater as my background music it plays the old summoners rift music. Not sure if you intended to give us the bilgewater music or not but just saying it would be nice to leave it as an option.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

This music was removed after the Burning Tides event. The UI will be correctly to reflect this in the next patch.
kind of a waste to produce such a good theme only to remove after the event
